text: Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap kav kim, Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar ana rugim, ana khavgia vov Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen veri. Ana verim, Zisas niamuuŋ gum ndia, mbe Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨva zɨn vov ana ndi Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨn zav, vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen veri. Mani ana ndigap, Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen vergim, Simeon mani han ana ndigap, ana sɨgɨra khɨngiap, Fhe Bakɨme zɨ ndi vun kuamkuav, khaŋ nzuai,
